_header: Of a chance I will you tell
_description: ‘A Penni Worthe of Witte’ — 400 lines in couplets

NLS1921.First Lines:
…Of a chaunce ichil ȝou telleÞat whilom in þis
                    londe bifelle…
NLS1921.Note:
400 lines in couplets; imperfect at beginning due to lost leaf, of which
                    only a stub remains (f. 256a); part of last line cut out with initial for next
                    work.

Laing,  David,
